Goblin Tactics.name: Goblin Tactics
Goblin Tactics.sourceRef: Monster Manual, Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Goblin Tactics.fullText:
Goblin Racial Utility Goblin Tactics

You avoid your enemy’s blow and cleverly dodge away.

At-Will
Immediate Reaction      Personal

Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack.

Effect: You shift 1 square.


Update (4/17/2012)
Updated in Into the Unknown.

Published in Monster Manual, Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook, page(s) 34.
Goblin Tactics.flavor: You avoid your enemy’s blow and cleverly dodge away.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack.

Effect: You shift 1 square.
Goblin Tactics.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack.

Fast Filch.name: Fast Filch
Fast Filch.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Fast Filch.fullText:
Goblin Racial Utility 2Fast Filch

In the blink of an eye, your tiny fingers relieve someone of a few prized possessions.

At-Will
Minor Action      Melee 1

Target: One adjacent creature granting combat advantage to you

Effect: You make a Thievery check against the target to pick its pocket or perform sleight of hand.


Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook, page(s) 39.
Fast Filch.flavor: In the blink of an eye, your tiny fingers relieve someone of a few prized possessions.

Leg Up.name: Leg Up
Leg Up.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Leg Up.fullText:
Goblin Racial Utility 2Leg Up

By bouncing off or scrabbling up the body of a nearby creature, you fling yourself through the air.

Encounter
Move Action      Personal

Requirement: You must be adjacent to a creature.

Effect: You jump up to your speed horizontally or up to 10 feet vertically.


Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook, page(s) 39.
Leg Up.flavor: By bouncing off or scrabbling up the body of a nearby creature, you fling yourself through the air.

Little Green Lie.name: Little Green Lie
Little Green Lie.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Little Green Lie.fullText:
Goblin Racial Utility 2Little Green Lie

At the last moment, you realize the best course of action here is to lie.

Encounter
Free Action      Personal

Trigger: You fail a Bluff, Diplomacy, or Intimidate check.

Effect: You reroll the check. If the triggering check was a Diplomacy or Intimidate check, use your Bluff modifier instead.


Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook, page(s) 39.
Little Green Lie.flavor: At the last moment, you realize the best course of action here is to lie.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You fail a Bluff, Diplomacy, or Intimidate check.

Effect: You reroll the check. If the triggering check was a Diplomacy or Intimidate check, use your Bluff modifier instead.

Living Shield.name: Living Shield
Living Shield.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Living Shield.fullText:
Goblin Racial Utility 6Living Shield

You dive behind a companion to avoid an attack.

Encounter
Immediate Interrupt      Personal

Trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee or ranged attack while you are adjacent to your ally.

Effect: You shift 1 square, and the attack hits the ally instead of you.


Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook, page(s) 39.
Living Shield.flavor: You dive behind a companion to avoid an attack.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee or ranged attack while you are adjacent to your ally.

Effect: You shift 1 square, and the attack hits the ally instead of you.

Living Shield.effect: You shift 1 square, and the attack hits the ally instead of you.

Unwitting Guardian.name: Unwitting Guardian
Unwitting Guardian.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Unwitting Guardian.fullText:
Goblin Racial Utility 6Unwitting Guardian

You duck under the bulk of one of the big folk, and it keeps you from being seen by the others while you make mischief.

Encounter
Move Action      Melee 1

Target: One adjacent Medium or larger enemy

Effect: You shift 1 square into the target’s space. Until the end of your next turn, you can occupy the same space as the target. Additionally, until the end of your next turn or until you and the target no longer share the same space, you are hidden from all creatures except the target. This effect ends immediately after you attack.


Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook, page(s) 39.

Down and Through.name: Down and Through
Down and Through.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Down and Through.fullText:
Goblin Racial Utility 10Down and Through

All of a sudden, you’re beneath your clumsy foe and then out the other side.

Encounter
Move Action      Personal

Effect: Choose a Medium or larger enemy adjacent to you, and shift up to 5 squares to a different square adjacent to that creature. You can move through that creature’s space during this shift.


Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook, page(s) 39.
